body_html:
@shreyneil You should avoid linking users to old versions of the installation instructions. The latest installation page for Windows on the Tensroflow website is available here: Installation Page for Windows

Please see my above comment on Python versions and let me know how you get on. For further installation issues you may find @mrry 's installation troubleshooter helper here: https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c

Please see my above comment on Python versions and let me know how you get on. For further installation issues you may find @mrry 's installation troubleshooter helper here: https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c
body:
@shreyneil You should avoid linking users to old versions of the installation instructions. The latest installation page for Windows on the Tensroflow website is available here:  [Installation Page for Windows](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows)

Please see my above comment on Python versions and let me know how you get on. For further installation issues you may find @mrry 's installation troubleshooter helper here: https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c
